++ Fellhuslyder

town of the Fell Fire Giant Family (huslyder), who have over generations, founded a city of thier own in a volcano near [Evernight], this is the shadowfell reflection of [Felwithe]

Thier main export is black steel ore, mined from deep within their Volcano
    -sold at 10g per lb


Lead by [Yhorm] the Fire Giant

Fire Giants only speak giant, and are very proud about it!
